title: fishy00001
author: fishy00001
created_time: February 09, 2023, 10:00:38 AMLast edit: February 09, 2023, 10:42:23 AM by fishy00001
content: Donation is  illegal against  make the forum look bad.you know what, fug that yahoo  i  I see that he keep posting on me on META so I will say things as they are without trolling.Only the truth.The guy is massive narcissist .few weeks ago  he said me I HOPE YOU WIN THE BET OF 3K. I WISH YOU THE BEST.I thought cool I am now cool with this guy without any fight with him. God bless him.Today I open a thread and striked like the fake he is.I  seriously doubt his heart problem. He has 2 characters.He only nice here to virtue signaling and to wait for day like this when he is big and people will donate him.He thoughts that people will donate him million of dollars but they donated him maybe 2k he is still brokie.When I ask him to provide proof of being in a hospital he ignore completely. (He never went to an hospital)He just rip you off. He has no empathy for you. He used you. You think but he is good he made deal before. he has big trust rate ? Yes because is a narcissist  to feel superior on other users. He d´oesnt care to scam you if it keep his importance.And this is the true.The forum is against donating but yet he is one thread of donating where he rip everyone off?He said I DONT WANT PEOPLE TO DONATE ME.but then ADD BTC ADRESS TO AVATAR AND ASK DONATION.Fake I told already? they guy is narcissist  real about it you got the picture of him.And this the honest true. I thought not to open up I am against  fights. all of these but i owe the truth for the forum-The forum look bad when this homeless ask  donation for his fake surgery. The 2 person that can vouch for him are his friends he call him now and ask him protection.Dont believe it. Ask real invoice. Real treatment invoices on papers. He rip you all off.I ONLY ASK YOU TO MAKE PROPER RESEARCH.Because I never feel so right like now.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: don't act like an idiot.QuoteDonation is  illegal against  make the forum look bad.donations are not illegal here, if you look a little more carefully at the forum, you will see a large number of such actions. This community is quite generous when it comes to donations and it should stay that way.QuoteI  seriously doubt his heart problem. He has 2 characters.I remember that he already had serious heart problems in March 2021, I think I have a picture somewhere that he sent from the hospital (on a Telegram channel) and he certainly didn't ask for any help then. I'm sure he didn't build his reputation and invent the whole health problem for $2k as you say.When I ask him to provide proof of being in a hospital he ignore completely. (He never went to an hospital)you are acting like a cunt and you are certainly the last person to whom any evidence should be presented.QuoteHe thoughts that people will donate him million of dollars but they donated him maybe 2k he is still brokie.do you think someone returns 39btc sent by mistake, and then a few years later invents a story about the illness to collect donations?do you also think that it is a combination of the same personality?Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=355846 Baryom    2018-11-03        I sent him 39.4 BTC instead of 0.394 BTC for a signature campaign payment. (My mistake obviously) He returned me 39.005 BTC as soon as he saw that :https://www.blockchain.com/btc/tx/3a9248a8b02038e237569c3bab0faa674f11575de97bc0dee7ccb307e121b10fWe are talking about $250,000. Thanks a lot.QuoteHe said I DONT WANT PEOPLE TO DONATE ME.but then ADD BTC ADRESS TO AVATAR AND ASK DONATION.you are obviously blinded by the negative feedback you received, so you only accept what you want to be written. And you are trying to portray his attitude towards the donation completely wrong.QuoteI ONLY ASK YOU TO MAKE PROPER RESEARCH.Because I never feel so right like now.I will also ask you to do better research before you start to embarrass yourself and say such nonsense.

If you can't donate, then just ignore. Take a chill pill.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First, like my bosses have said above me, donation was never an illegal thing to do on this forum, Infact, donating to several charitable events has been a thing of old ages here on the forum, so, you are sure mistake by assuming that running a donation program on this forum is illegal.Secondly, yahoo is a trusted member if this forum, he will never do such as you claim, I believe that if he wanted to scam this community and still maintain he's reputation, there are other ways he would have done it without involving himself and a heart problem, heart issues is not a kind of illness any one should pray for or wish upon him or her self, as we all know that things we liken or link ourselves with by verbal or written expressions has a way of finding itself into our lives..So I believe yahoo would lie with such an illness as a heart failure..So just kill the hate and work hard so you could become a reputable member like him.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 09, 2023, 12:12:34 PM[snip]Or I want to see here good non bias vouches. That is me. I never vouch for him since the start here but I believed in him.Why do you have that butthurt about the donation? If you check his thread very carefully, yahoo did not ask about it. That is upon the community's decision if they are generous they will send and donate to yahoo in any amount, and in fact --he is not asking you [or anyone], is not he? That is their willingness to donate as a sign of sympathy for him.As a matter of fact --he has a lot of credibilities to believe than you and you are free not to believe in him. Just move on kid!Edited:Good for you OP.Quote from: mprep on February 09, 2023, 02:03:57 PM[snip]P.S. The user has now been banned for ban evasion.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: What vouches do you want from the community? Don't you see the feedback written on his trust feedback page? Stop acting stupid. Where in this forum written that donation is illegal? I am sorry if it's illegal. I am not aware of that. I believe He is a 100% Honest guy with a big heart. You are accusing him of bullshit while he doesn't care about such a tiny amount. He already dealing with a couple of hundred thousand dollars. He is suffering right now, please stop the drama and delete this thread.

comments.author: lizarder
comments.body: Is there anyone who acts silly to say he is seriously ill, if you have ever heard a saying like this "Words are Prayers".Quote from: fishy00001 on February 09, 2023, 10:00:38 AMDonation is  illegal against  make the forum look bad.Is donation a crime in the forum, so that you say that this is an Illegal action? On the other hand there are no restrictions regarding donations that have been running on the forum and you don't even have to bother if you don't want to donate. Many forms of donations have been made in the forum and even outside of personal interests.I do not recognize and have never collaborated with the person you accuse of lying about their illness. But one thing I know, yahoo62278 reputation in the forums can make me trust him.

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: OP, really you need a drama? Leave the man alone. Good and bad makes a man but none is too bad to hate a man who is fighting his death. Whoever you are, whatever happened to you, as a human you should be better than this.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Quote from: fishy00001 on February 09, 2023, 10:00:38 AMDonation is  illegal against  make the forum look bad. -snip-As others have said, donations are not illegal, but begging is. But yahoo62278 didn't beg! The donations flowed to him voluntarily and that is the big difference. We can trust him and he has often proven that here in the forum. That's why his whole sad story is really believable and nobody has any doubts that it couldn't be true. Because of that nobody asked for proof and yahoo62278 doesn't have to prove anything either. Therefore, he will not have answered you either, as there is no reason for it. His experiences over the past few weeks are bad enough and needn't be made worse by a thread like this.

comments.author: fachant
comments.body: Its not a compulsion to donate to yahoo62278. Anyone who want can send to him and everyone here is smart enough to know who is worthy to be trusted. Yahoo62278 has earned trust of this community over the years that's why people are donating him. If its so easy to get donations here, OP just start a thread and see whether someone willing to give you even a cent?
